decision_conditions: detrimental affect on health and appeara
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 3 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T2) - Cut back by 2.5 metres to allow significant clearance from the building. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T3) - Remove basal growth and crown lift to 2 metres. Reduce all aspects of the crown by approx 2-2.5m. Remove dead wood. Standing in T2 of Tree Preservation Order.2 x Lime (applicants ref. G1) - Reduce by approx 2.5m to allow 2.5 metre clearance from the building, back the most recent previous points of reduction. Standing in Group G2 of Tree Preservation Order. (amended)Maple Group (applicants ref. G2) - Clear all branches that are interfering with the street lights by reducing 0.5 - 1m from the street lights. Crown lift to approximately 2 metres. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (amended)Mixed Group (applicants ref. G2.2) -Cut back from the building to allow approx. 2m clearance. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.2 x Lime (applicants ref. G3) - Cut back all growth growing towards the rear of the buildings.  Reduce of 1.5 - 2m in order to achieve a 2m clearance from the buildings. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (amended)
